data.meta_description: Viola Herrod Williams, 69, of Allegan died Thursday, October 22 at Allegan General Hospital.She was born April 15, 1940 in West Memphis, Arkansas to Johnnie and Lottie Williams. Viola enjoyed being with her grandchildren, sewing, reading, educating herself on new things and spending time with her family and friends.She is preceded in death along with her parents by her daughter – Cheryl Williams who died in 2003 and a brother – Willie Lee Williams in 2006.She is survived by her son – Michael Williams and her sister – Julie AnnWake will be Thursday, October 29 from 1 – 2 at the Filbrandt Family Funeral Home. Funeral serviced will begin at 2:00 P.M. on Thursday at the funeral home with Pastor Fred L. Cunningham officiating. data.text:
Viola Herrod Williams, 69, of Allegan died Thursday, October 22 at Allegan General Hospital.

She was born April 15, 1940 in West Memphis, Arkansas to Johnnie and Lottie Williams. Viola enjoyed being with her grandchildren, sewing, reading, educating herself on new things and spending time with her family and friends.

She is preceded in death along with her parents by her daughter – Cheryl Williams who died in 2003 and a brother – Willie Lee Williams in 2006.

She is survived by her son – Michael Williams and her sister – Julie Ann

Wake will be Thursday, October 29 from 1 – 2 at the Filbrandt Family Funeral Home. Funeral serviced will begin at 2:00 P.M. on Thursday at the funeral home with Pastor Fred L. Cunningham officiating. Kindly share your thoughts and memories on the family’s online guest book at www.FilbrandtFFH.com.

The family is being helped by the Filbrandt Family Funeral Home of South Haven 637-0333.
